description: Meet the Lowdown, Chaco’s lightweight, low-profile sport sandal built for a travel-ready life on the go. Featuring just the essentials in an easy slip-on slide design, the Lowdown Slide looks great dressed up or down and is engineered with high-rebound Eva and their contoured Luvseat™ arch-support for healthy alignment and all-day comfort underfoot.
name: Chaco Lowdown Slide - Mens
